trends.title: The Rise of AI-Generated Micro-Influencers
trends.summary: Brands are experimenting with AI-generated influencer personas to deliver hyper-targeted social campaigns without human scheduling or contracts.
trends.whyItMatters: AI-driven personas can help brands scale influencer campaigns at lower cost while maintaining creative control and tailoring messages to niche communities.
exampleUseCases: Testing campaign concepts without real-world risk

trends.title: Shoppable Short-Form Video Overtakes Static Social Ads
trends.summary: Interactive, shoppable videos on TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts are driving higher conversion rates than traditional feed ads.
trends.whyItMatters: Consumers increasingly expect to purchase directly from within content, removing friction and boosting impulse buys.
exampleUseCases: Partnering with creators for shoppable Reels
Embedding product tags in TikTok challenges
Running seasonal sales through short-form content

trends.title: Retail Media Networks Expand Beyond Grocery
trends.summary: Retail media, once dominated by supermarkets, is expanding into fashion, home goods, and electronics, creating new brand opportunities.
trends.whyItMatters: Retailers with rich shopper data are becoming key media players, allowing brands to target consumers close to purchase.
exampleUseCases: Running ads on electronics retailer apps
Creating co-branded content with fashion chains
Leveraging first-party purchase data for retargeting

creative.imagePrompt: Digital billboards inside a retail store
creative.podcastSnippet: How retail media networks are moving beyond grocery into every category.

trends.title: Brands Turn to Predictive Creative Testing
trends.summary: Machine learning models can now forecast the performance of ad creatives before they go live.
trends.whyItMatters: Predictive testing reduces wasted spend and accelerates creative iteration by showing which concepts will perform best before launch.
exampleUseCases: A/B testing ad scripts before production
Prioritizing high-performing concepts in media buys

creative.podcastSnippet: Why brands are embracing predictive creative testing to save budget and time.
